about_the_game:
Two factions await you, each with its own enchanting power. Will you choose to pledge allegiance to the Infernal Guardians, resonating with the burning echoes of the abyss? Or will you submit to the Legion of Agony, summoning the shadows of the dead to serve your dark designs?

Select from over thirty cards and construct your army yourself. Bone corpses, macabre occultists, or even imperfect tyrants – the choice is yours!

Make your selection from four formidable warlords.
Will you choose the Lord of Necromancy? The Lord of Curses? Or one of the fiery lords of the Infernal Flames?
Their distinct passives will shape your destiny on the battlefield, offering you endless possibilities to triumph.

Be enchanted by the unique mechanics of souls, a mysterious concept that transcends the boundaries of classic card games. Beware, mastering souls will require deep reflection and remarkable gaming intelligence.

Face adversaries from all corners of the world and rise to the top of the rankings. Your mastery of war and sharp strategy are the keys to defeating your enemies and claiming your place among the legends.

Soul War stands as a symbol of fairness and balance.
Our commitment is that the game will never become "pay to win." Our economy is based on the sale of cosmetics, offering every player the opportunity to personalize their heroes, cards, and battlegrounds, ensuring that every valiant soul can stand out on the battlefield.

short_description: Immerse yourself in a dark, epic war between the Legion of Agony and the Infernal Guardians, where the quest for the mysterious Soul Stone tears apart the realms. Choose your side and get ready for an unforgiving battle to establish your dominance over a world in turmoil.
